messages.message:
Hello - hopefully this is the right group, if not please point me in the correct direction.  I'm looking for some help on this paper
https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/1OYsm-lyTz5aaOuW9RXo1Z79apN5TgC62y4cEy0snDOw/edit#slide=id.gee140738f6_0_0
1, is it still relevant
2, can we share with customers
3, I have some really simple questions on some of the content who could help me, won't take more than 30mins of your time
Thank you
if i had to guess this looks like images I’ve seen from the marketing side of things? @aristo do you know?

@Heymian @Paul Gilbert wanted to share a bit more context on this asset - this content was created by our former technical product marketer with the help of Infra Engineering team and the intent that it should help support customer conversations. We are currently hiring a new person in this role but until then, we’ll need help from Eng side to help verify the relevancy and if and where we need updates. So we need help from this group on (1) and (3) and answer to second question is yes pending confirmation on (1). Hope this helps!
Citi group are asking for a document such as this, it would be a great help to be able to forward it.  Thank you
